titles.title: A bill to impose a moratorium on large agribusiness, food and beverage manufacturing, and grocery retail mergers, and to establish a commission to review large agriculture, food and beverage manufacturing, and grocery retail mergers, concentration, and market power.
Food and Agribusiness Merger Moratorium and Antitrust Review Act of 2018
Food and Agribusiness Merger Moratorium and Antitrust Review Act of 2018
Food and Agribusiness Merger Moratorium and Antitrust Review Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
